entities.name: PCAOB
entities.description: PCAOB stands for Public Company Accounting Oversight Board, which sets the standards for auditing financial statements.

entities.name: AUDIT COMMITTEE
entities.description: The audit committee is responsible for overseeing the financial reporting process, including the communication of critical audit matters.

entities.name: COMPANY
entities.description: The company being audited, which offers customers the ability to acquire multiple licenses of software products and services, including cloud-based services, through its volume licensing programs.

relationships.relationship_description: The PCAOB standards require communication of critical audit matters to the audit committee.
The company's critical audit matters are communicated to the audit committee.
